mapper.select:
select /* WaaBscLvlMapper.selectByPrimaryKey */
from WAA_BSC_LVL where BSC_ID = #{bscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.insert: insert /* WaaBscLvlMapper.insert */ into WAA_BSC_LVL (BSC_ID, EXP_DTM, BSC_LVL, STR_DTM, SELECT_BOX_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID) values (#{bscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bscLvl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{strDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{selectBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update /* WaaBscLvlMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAA_BSC_LVL
BSC_LVL = #{bscLvl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STR_DTM = #{strDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SELECT_BOX_ID = #{selectBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT_BOX_NM = #{selectBoxNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BSC_ID = #{bscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EXP_DTM = #{expDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update /* WaaBscLvlMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAA_BSC_LVL set BSC_LVL = #{bscLvl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STR_DTM = #{strDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SELECT_BOX_ID = #{selectBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELECT_BOX_NM = #{selectBoxNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BSC_ID = #{bscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EXP_DTM = #{expDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
UPDATE /* WaaBscLvlMapper.updateExpDtm */ WAA_BSC_LVL SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE BSC_ID = #{bscId} AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
